resources.string: Vivek Paul with his Tag Heuer, July 2005. Mr. Paul is a man who is never late.
About Vivek Paul Vivek Paul is an Indian-born businessman and founder of KineticGlue, a cloud based software company. He is also a Consulting Professor of Radiology at Stanford University.
Bought July 9th, 2005; to celebrate the new office.
On May 5, Wipro vice chairman Vivek Paul walked into the second floor Bangalore offices of Wipro executive vice president (human resources), Pratik Kumar. The meeting was unscheduled.
